answers.answer: While she does not feel hungry, is she nonetheless eating more or less normally?  If she's not been eating much if anything at all for a long time (a month?), aside from risking massive internal organ damage, there are various odd body deterioration symptoms to be expected (incuding a bloated stomach).Assuming she's not out in a hot desert, drinking lots of water and feeling thirsty all the time is often a classic and STRONG symptom of diabetes (I think she ought to get tested for that, promptly).  Is she somewhat or very overweight?

question: My sister recently realized that she does not feel hungry most of the time, is sort of gaining weight and her fingers bleed for no reason. Please help! Is there something wrong? She also drinks a lot of water. A lot. Could that be the reason? She claims she feels thirsty all the time.
title: Fingers Bleed For No Apparent Reason
